About

Hi, my name is Jasdev Singh! I'm currently an engineer at Imgur working on their iOS app and API.

I've previously attended CodePath (Spring 2015, Swift). Interned at Twitter (in the KPCB Fellow '13 Class), Fitocracy, and Microsoft. I was one of the founders of UVa's first student hackathon and also studied math and computer science there (SEAS '14'). In my free time, I love building habits, attending hackathons, using emojis ğŸ˜, and browsing r/corgi.

I'm originally from and grew up in Virginia, lived in San Francisco for a year after graduating, and am currently working remotely until my wonderful girlfriend and I move to NYC in August '15 ğŸ’
